summary.span: 表示 控件中的一个项。

span.span: Represents an item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象表示中的项控制，例如标题部分中，页脚部分，或者数据项目。A object represents an item in a control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data item. 中的数据项都存储在控件，可以通过访问属性的控件。The data items in the control are stored in a that can be accessed by using the property of the control. 可以使用以编程方式访问中的项的属性控件。You can use a to programmatically access the properties of an item in a control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用若要显示的内容中的每个数据项控件。The following example demonstrates how to use a to display the contents of each data item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置与 控件中 对象关联的数据项。

span.span: Gets or sets a data item associated with the object in the control.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示 控件中的一个数据项。

span.span: An that represents a data item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定与其关联的数据项的属性对象中控件。Use the property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the object in the control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于数据项控件。This property only applies to data items in the control. 的属性对象必须设置为其中一个枚举值。The property of the object must be set to one of the enumeration values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来显示内容中的数据项控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the contents of the data items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取控件的 集合中的 对象的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the object from the collection of the control.

value.span: 集合中的 对象的索引。

span.span: The index of the object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定索引数对象从集合。Use the property to determine the index number of the object from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于数据项控件。This property only applies to data items in the control. 的属性对象必须设置为`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property of the object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来显示的索引号对象从控件的集合。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the index number of the object from the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取由 控件中 对象表示的项的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the item represented by the object in the control.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定所表示的项类型对象。Use the property to determine the type of the item represented by the object. 下表列出了各种项类型。The following table lists the various item types. |项目类型Item Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|标题部分的控件。The heading section of the control.| |`Footer`|脚注部分的控件。The footer section of the control.| |`Item`|中的项控件。An item in the control.| |`AlternatingItem`|中的交替项控件。An alternating item in the control.| |`SelectedItem`|中的选定的项控件。The selected item in the control.| |`EditItem`|为进行编辑选定的项控件。The item selected for editing in the control.| |`Separator`|项之间的分隔符控件。A separator between the items of the control.| |`Pager`|页上选择部分的控件。The page selection section of the control.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定所表示的项的项类型对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the item type of the item represented by the object. 在创建项的顺序项类型以及显示控件。The order that items are created in the control is displayed along with the item type. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示如何 ASP.NET 应呈现 HTML 控件的控件处于禁用状态时。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 会将`disabled`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 会将`class`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .
